subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Johan Bruyneel pronounced himself "speechless" that his team, RadioShack, had been excluded from competing in the Vuelta a España. The organizers' decision to make the move seems less than sporting.
snippet: Johan Bruyneel pronounced himself "speechless" that his team, RadioShack, had been excluded from competing in the Vuelta a España. The organizers' decision to make the move seems less than sporting.
